author: redbeardlegoman
title: It's Time To Light The Lights (Part 1)
review:
The Colour Light is a great little accessory that we could use more of.  There isn't a lot to it, but what it has, it uses well.   I think it would have been perfect if this and all the other Studios polybag sets were available as an accessories pack. 

Pros

  • Instantly recognizable for what it is.
  • Uses a limited piece count effectively.
  • Really helps flesh out your Lego Studio with the right atmosphere.

Cons

  • On it's own, this set is lacking in most areas.
This would be much better as just one of a larger accessories set.
